data.actual_result: The device vibrates even if no menu is popped up
data.expected_result: The device shouldn't vibrate as it won't show any menus
data.short_description: DMs button vibrates like if it was to pop up a menu but doesn't
data.steps_to_repro: - Hold your finger on the DMs button (Add friends also works) - The device will slightly vibrate like if it was to open a menu like a server, but doesn't
